mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lee accepts a plea from General McClellan to allow captured Federal officers' personal "baggage" to pass between the lines of the two armies.
The available files include a JPG image file created by scanning the original document and a PDF transcript of the document.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: McClellan, George Brinton, 1826-1885
United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Prisoners and prisons
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from R. E. Lee to General George B. McClellan, July 12, 1862 (correspondence)
